A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonHandler
when the ok button is pushed the frame is hidden and ClubAbstractEntity.commit() is invoked.
when the cancel button is pushed the frame is hidden and ClubAbstractEntity.rollBack() is invoked.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This method gets a click event and checks its origin.
addToCenter(Component) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
this method recievs a guicomponent (a panel- as given in this program)
it than adds into the ClubAbstractEntity.centerPanel which has a FlowLayout layout - which means that every panel that will be added will be added vertically.
central panel will than be added into the ClubAbstractEntity panel that has a BorderLayout layout.

B

ButtonHandler() - Constructor for class ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonHandler
 
buttons_array - Variable in class NightClubMgmtApp
 
buttonsHandler - Variable in class ClubAbstractEntity
 

C

cancel_Button(boolean) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
protected method cancel_Button controls the availability of the button, according to each abstract entitiy instance and needs.
the @param state is controlled from the inheritors of the abstract class.
each instance of person/soldier/student can control the cancel button according to its needs and state of operation.
cancelButton - Variable in class ClubAbstractEntity
 
centerPanel - Variable in class ClubAbstractEntity
 
ClubAbstractEntity - Class in <Unnamed>
class ClubAbstractEntity is an abstract class and is the backbone of the entire app.
it extends JFrame JFrame which makes it a JFrame by itself.
it holds all the instance variables needed for the entitiy to perform, and its relevant methods eg: ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component)
ClubAbstractEntity() - Constructor for class ClubAbstractEntity
ClubAbstractEntity parameterless constructor
Initializes every window as a JFrame (JFrame).
sets the window's attributes.
ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonHandler - Class in <Unnamed>
inner class ButtonsHandler implements java.awt.event ActionListener
and java.io serializable
the class controls the operations of each button (ok and cancel buttons) from the buttonsPanel.
clubbers - Variable in class NightClubMgmtApp
 
commit() - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
This abstract method will save the clubber input data into the clubber's instance fields.
*this method will be overidden according to each Person entity needs.
commit() - Method in class Person
this method overrides inherited abstract method Person.commit().
this method will set the validated and relevant data to the correct instance variable field,
and invoke ClubAbstractEntity.cancel_Button(boolean) which will enable the cancel button.
commit() - Method in class Soldier
this method overrides inherited abstract method Soldier.commit().
this method will set the validated and relevant data to the correct instance variable field,
and invokes Person.commit() which will enable the cancel button.
commit() - Method in class Student
this method overrides inherited abstract method commit().
this method will set the validated and relevant data to the correct instance variable field,
and invokes Person.commit() which will enable the cancel button.

id - Variable in class Person

L

loadClubbersDBFromFile() - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This method will creat a FileInputStream FileInputStream and a ObjectInputStream ObjectInputStream to read the clubber's data from the binary file.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This method is the main - the program's entry point.
manipulateDB() - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This method invokes an input dialog @param input that asks for a clubber's ID (key).
Than the method iterates through the clubbers arraylist and checks if the input (the key given by the user) matches any clubbers's ID, if theres a match it displays the requested clubber's window along with all it's data.
if no clubber was found, display a message dialog JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object) with an appropriate message.
match(String) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
This abstract method meant to return true or false - dependends if the given key matching the clubber's unique id.
*this method will be overidden according to each entity validation needs.
match(String) - Method in class Person
This method overrides inherited abstract method Person.match(java.lang.String)
this method check if the user id - entered in the relevant JTextfield (JTextField)
match(String) - Method in class Soldier
this method overrides inherited method Soldier.match(java.lang.String)
the method onvokes Person match function and if it returns true, than @return true if super match method returned false,
another check is being performed , String.regionMatches(int, java.lang.String, int, int) is being performed to check if the key matches the student's id from the 5th digit
match(String) - Method in class Student
this method overrides inherited method match(java.lang.String)
the method onvokes Person match function and if it returns true, than @return true if super match method returned false,
another check is being performed , String.regionMatches(int, java.lang.String, int, int) is being performed to check if the key matches the student's id from the 5th digit

N

name - Variable in class Person
 
NightClubMgmtApp - Class in <Unnamed>
This class implements the main menu for the program and initializes all the different components ,including reading clubbers's data from a binary file, and writing it back into the file before the program closes.
This Class extends JFrame JFrame, which makes the entire NightClubMgmtApp a JFRAME.
It holds the clubbers ArrayList ClubAbstractEntity.
This class also implements an ActionListener
NightClubMgmtApp() - Constructor for class NightClubMgmtApp
Parameterless constructor NightClubMgmtApp() initializes the main window (the main menu) reads all objects from a file to the clubbers array.

O

okButton - Variable in class ClubAbstractEntity
 

P

Person - Class in <Unnamed>
public class Person extends ClubAbstractEntity which means each person entitiy is also a JFrame by itself.
this class holds several String instance variables id, name surname, tel that are the Person's details.
it also holds two arrays:
1.textFields which is a JTextField array.
Person() - Constructor for class Person
Person empty constructor - this constructor meant for searching and updating clubber data.
Person(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Person
Person 4 parameters constructor - creates a Person with the given information.
each person will be created only after data validation.
The constructor creates a panel with the relevant text-fields and labels and than adds this panel into a larger panel.
Each small panel is made of 1 label (ID, Name, etc),a texfield,and an hidden '*'.
Than each small panel is being added to the main panel- Person (each person is also a JPanel and a ClubAbstractEntity - as mentioned)
personalNumber - Variable in class Soldier
 
personalNumtextField - Variable in class Soldier
 

R

rollBack() - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
This abstract method is meant discard any changes made
*this method will be overidden according to each Person entity needs.
rollBack() - Method in class Person
override method Person.rollBack() - reverse the operation and setting each text filed back to its original values.
which means take the instance variables values, and enter them to the textfields
rollBack() - Method in class Soldier
override method Soldier.rollBack() - reverse the operation and setting each text filed back to its original values.
which means take the instance variables values, and enter them to the textfields
invokes Person.rollBack() to roll back changes, returns the textfiled state to its previous state,
and re-hides the '*' (if one is present.
rollBack() - Method in class Student
override method rollBack() - reverse the operation and setting each text filed back to its original values.
which means take the instance variables values, and enter them to the textfields
invokes Person.rollBack() to roll back changes, returns the textfiled state to its previous state,
and re-hides the '*' (if one is present.

S

Soldier - Class in <Unnamed>
Public class Soldier which extends Person (which makes it a ClubAbstractEntity and also a JFrame).
Soldier() - Constructor for class Soldier
Soldier empty constructor - this constructor meant for searching and updating clubber's data - Soldier type
will invoke Soldier's 5 parameter constructor with 'null' values, will disable the cancel button ClubAbstractEntity.cancel_Button(boolean), and set the window to be visible.
Soldier(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Soldier
Soldier constructor this constructor meant for creating ind initializing new Soldier type clubber.
this constructor will invoke Person
this constuctor will color the "*" red, and hide it.
it will create a new 'small panel' made of 1 label (ID, Name, etc), a texfield, and an hidden '*'.
it than invokes ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component) and sends to it the newly created additional panel this entity needs.
Student - Class in <Unnamed>
Public class Student which extends Person (which makes it a ClubAbstractEntity and also a javax.swing.JFrame).
Student() - Constructor for class Student
Student empty constructor - this constructor meant for searching and updating clubber's data - Student type
will invoke Student's 5 parameter constructor with 'null' values, will disable the cancel button ClubAbstractEntity.cancel_Button(boolean), and set the window to be visible.
Student(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Student
Student constructor this constructor meant for creating ind initializing new Student type clubber.
this constructor will invoke Person
this constuctor will color the "*" red, and hide it.
it will create a new 'small panel' made of 1 label (ID, Name, etc), a texfield, and an hidden '*'.
it than invokes ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component) and sends to it the newly created additional panel this entity needs.

V

validateData() - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
This abstract method meant to returns true if the entire object content have been validated.
validateData() - Method in class Person
This method overrides inherited abstract method Person.validateData()
this method will validate the data (data is being treated as a regular expression) entered by the user in the next sequence:
ID field RE: '\\d-\\d{7}\\|[1-9]':
digit, followed by '-', followed by 7 digits, followed by '|', followed by a non-zero digit (e.g.
validateData() - Method in class Soldier
this method overrides inherited method Person.validateData()
[(R|O|C)]/[1-9]\\d{6} checks for one capital letter of either of the 3 letters - R, O, or C (shortcut for: Rank, Officer or Chief
(can also be a Non-commissioned officer),
followed by a '/', followed by 7 digits (first digit must be non-zero).
validateData() - Method in class Student
this method overrides inherited method Person.validateData()
[A-Z]{3}/[1-9]\\d{4} checks for A-Z chars for the first 3 characters, searches for a '/' in the 4th character,
than checks for numbers only

W

writeClubbersDBtoFile() - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This method writes the clubbers array into the file every time the program closes (by pressing the close button(red X)).
this method is invoked only when the close button(red X) is pressed.
Otherwise, the program will not save any changes nor new clubbers.
this method created two Output Streams (File and Object) than it writes the clubbers array into the Object output stream and than both stream closes.
this method catches two exceptions:
1.FileNotFounException FileNotFoundException - will be cought when no file was found.
2.IOException IOException - will be cought if the streamer cann't write to the file.
